sentences.en: An international famous brand garment is in this city's flagship.
sentences.cn: 一家是国际闻名的服装品牌在此城的旗舰店.

sentences.en: And that is the flagship high - performance, high - quality, ultra - quiet, " with dual - core drive. "
sentences.cn: 而且是目前主打的高性能 、 高品质 、 超静音, “ 带双核的硬盘 ”.

sentences.en: Company flagship product: The company assembled 150,170 large - EPE foam cloth production line.
sentences.cn: 公司主打产品: 公司主要装配150型、170型大型EPE泡布生产线.

sentences.en: Flagship brand in the educational community , boasting 10 years of successful lecture!
sentences.cn: 旗舰教育品牌, 十年成功办学!

sentences.en: Its sister , the Admiral Kuznetsov, is the flagship of Russia's navy.
sentences.cn: 它的姊妹舰“ 库兹涅佐夫 ”号现在已经是俄海军旗舰.

sentences.en: Starbucks's flagship store was modest but full of character.
sentences.cn: 明星咖啡连锁公司的总店朴实无华,却别具风格.

sentences.en: The company is opening a new flagship store in London.
sentences.cn: 这家公司将在伦敦新开一家旗舰店。

sentences.en: The company's flagship Media Composer package runs $ 5, 000.
sentences.cn: 该公司的旗舰产品MediaComposer套装软件售价5, 000美元.

sentences.en: The flagship flashed a signal to the fleet.
sentences.cn: 旗舰向舰队发出闪光信号.

sentences.en: the flagship of the new Ford range
sentences.cn: 新款福特汽车系列中的旗舰产品

sentences.en: The Forward Unto Dawn was originally the flagship of Fleet Admiral Hood.
sentences.cn: 航向黎明号原为胡德统帅的旗舰.

sentences.en: The Greenpeace flagship is voyaging through the Arctic cold of the Barents Sea.
sentences.cn: 绿色和平组织的旗舰正在穿越巴伦支海的北极寒冷地带。

sentences.en: This is the flagship system in our range of computers.
sentences.cn: 在我们的电脑类别中,这是顶尖(旗舰)的系统.

sentences.en: This was the Vasa, royal flagship of the great imperial fleet.
sentences.cn: 这就是“瓦萨”号, 帝国大舰队的皇家旗舰.

sentences.en: We are developing our flagship serviced apartments in Lujiazui, Pudong.
sentences.cn: 我们正在浦东陆家嘴开发本集团的旗舰服务式公寓.

sentences.en: You'll take the grandest as your flagship, and who's to argue?
sentences.cn: 因为你将选一条最大的做你的旗舰谁还会反对?

words.tran_cn: 旗舰；（作定语）一流；佼佼者

trans.tran_cn: 旗舰，〈比喻〉最重要的一个，佼佼者
trans.tran_en: the most important ship in a group of ships belonging to the navy
